headline: Delta Air Lines Q1 Preview: Cheaper Oil Presents A Strong Tailwind

headline: Take a look inside Delta’s new 24,000-square-foot Sky Club lounge in Atlanta
summary: Delta’s new lounge features a large bar, soundproof phone booths, a full buffet, and seating for more than 500 people.

headline: UBS Analysts Downgrade Airlines Amid Recession Fears
summary: UBS analysts on Monday downgraded and cut their price targets for a number of airlines amid concerns that the Trump administration's tariffs will drive the U.S. economy into a recession.

headline: Delta to kick off airline earnings: What to expect
summary: Delta Air Lines (DAL) is set to kick off airline earnings on Wednesday. Wealth host Brad Smith joins Catalysts with Madison Mills to outline what to watch as airline earnings come through, highlighting key names like American Air, (AAL) United Airlines (UAL), and Southwest (LUV). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

headline: UBS downgrades US airlines on recession fears, sees lower earnings
summary: Investing.com -- UBS downgraded Alaska Air (NYSE:ALK), Delta Air Lines (NYSE:DAL), and United Airlines from Buy to Neutral warning that a likely U.S. recession could weigh on revenue and profits across the airline sector.

raw.headline: UBS downgrades US airlines on recession fears, sees lower earnings
